content: For you are my God: you alone are my joy.
You give marvelous comrades to me:
the faithful who dwell in your land. Those
who choose a lien god have chosen an
You are my portion and cup; it is you
that I claim for my prize. Your heritage
is my delight, the lot you have given to me.
Glad are my heart and my soul; securely
my body shall rest. For you will not leave
me for dead, nor lead your beloved astray.
